price: 8. Waxaa ka baajin iyadana ciqaabta inay dhaarato afar jeer, iyadoo marag gashaneysa Alle inuu been sheegayo.
arabic: وَيَدۡرَؤُاْ عَنۡهَا ٱلۡعَذَابَ أَن تَشۡهَدَ أَرۡبَعَ شَهَٰدَٰتِۭ بِٱللَّهِ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayadra-u ʿanhā al-ʿadhāba an tashhada arbaʿa shahādātin bil-lahi innahu lamina al-kādhibīna
